pages.title: Lost Eye
pages.text: $(o)The Restone, even to this day, remains a mystery to us, both in its operation and in its true origin.

$(o)An $(l)Ender Eye$()$(o) can be imbued with energy from this mineral.$(br2)$(o)You have to place it with $(l)Redstone$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l), creating the $(l)Lost Eye$()$(o) in the process.

pages.title: Witch Eye
pages.text: $(o)The Villager's fear and uncertainty of the unknown caused the Witches to leave the Villages.

$(o)Their pupils are said to contain great arcane power.$(br2)If you were able to put together a $(l)Witch Pupil$() $(o)and an $(l)Eye of Ender$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(o), you will be able to create the $(l)Witch Eye$()$(o).$()

pages.title: Rogue Eye
pages.text: $(o)The $(l)Rogue Eye$()$(o) is hidden inside of the temples located in the depths of the Jungles over the Overworld.

pages.title: Old Eye
pages.text: $(o)The $(l)Old Eye$()$(o) is hidden inside of the temples located in the Deserts over the Overworld.

pages.title: Cold Eye
pages.text: $(o)The $(l)Cold Eye$()$(o) is hidden inside of the different structures located in the snowy biomes as the Taigas, Tundras, or Mountains over the Overworld.

pages.title: Black Eye
pages.text: $(o)The $(l)Black Eye$()$(o) is a very rare treasure that some pirates hid.$(br2)May some Villagers will exchange Treasure Maps to you.

pages.title: Corrupted Eye
pages.text: $(o)The illagers, being greedy creatures that they are, among their stolen belongings have $(l)Corrupted Eyes$()$(o) stored in their structures.

pages.title: Magical Eye
pages.text: $(o)The Evokers learned the art of necromancy in their Mansions using the $(l)Magical Eye$() they possess. They won't give it away so easily, you'll have to get it by force.

pages.title: Guardian Eye
pages.text: $(o)In the depths of the Oceans are the Ocean Monuments where the Elder Guardians dwell. Defeat one of these creatures to get the $(l)Guardian Eye$()$(o).

pages.title: Wither Eye
pages.text: $(o)The union of Wither Skeletons Skulls forms a powerful creature known as the Wither. You will be able to get the $(l)Wither Eye$()$(o) once you defeat this creature.

pages.title: End Crystal Eye
pages.text: $(o)The End Crystal is the hardest material that you can find in this world.

$(o)You can place this hard material with $(o)an $(l)Eye of Ender$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(o).$(br2)This will allow you to create the $(l)End Crystal Eye$()$(o).$()

pages.title: Nether Eye
pages.text: $(o)The $(l)Nether Eye$()$(o) is hidden inside of the Fortress or other structures located over the Nether.
